name: Five or More
description: Five or More is a desktop puzzle game. With color balls constantly pouring into the screen, player needs to move the balls to line up 5 balls of the same color (the line can be horizontal, vertical or inclined). Once the balls are lined up, they will disappear and the player will earn points, the game ends when the screen is filled with color balls.

en_US.description: Five or More is a desktop puzzle game. With color balls constantly pouring into the screen, player needs to move the balls to line up 5 balls of the same color (the line can be horizontal, vertical or inclined). Once the balls are lined up, they will disappear and the player will earn points, the game ends when the screen is filled with color balls.
en_US.name: Five or More

zh_CN.description: 连珠消球是一款桌面益智游戏，随着彩球不断地注入屏幕，玩家需要移动彩球，让更多的五个以上同色球体连成直线（直线可以是水平线，垂直线或斜线），一旦这些球体被连成直线，它们就会消失然后玩家得分，当彩球满屏时游戏结束。
zh_CN.name: 连珠消球
